name: Arachnid Quarter
rules: If a raiding hero or ally would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much -1 instead.;On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Put a Web Wrap from your graveyard into your hand.;When a Boss is destroyed, destroy all Naxxramas tokens.;When Maexxna is destroyed, flip this card.;BACK:;When this card flips to this side, say Who dares violate the sanctity of my domain? Be warned, all who trespass here are doomed!;If a raiding hero or ally would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +1 instead.

name: Anub'Rekhan
rules:
Assault 2
At the start of your turn, Anub'Rekhan deals 2 melee damage to a random raiding hero.
On your turn: 3 -> Flip Anub'Rekhan face down.
BACK: When Anub'Rekhan flips to this side, put a Crypt Guard into play.
Anub'Rekhan cant' attack.
When a hero or ally deals combat damage to Anub'Rekhan, he deals 2 nature damage to that character.
At the start of your turn, flip Anub'Rekhan.
flavour: Closer now... tasty morsels. I've been too long without food. Without blood to drink.

name: Grand Widow Faerlina
rules:
Assault 5
At the start of your turn, Faerlina deals 3 fire damage to each raiding hero.
On your turn: 6 -> Flip Faerlina face down.
BACK: Assault 8
2 -> Ready Faerlina.

name: Maexxna
rules:
Assault 8
At the start of your turn, heroes and allies in target raider's party lose and can't have powers this turn.
On your turn: 9 -> Flip Maexxna face down.
BACK: Assault 12
At the start of your turn, if you didn't take take the last turn, take an extra turn after this one.
flavour: She feeds her blood the corpses of all those who dare venture too deeply into Naxxramas.

name: Construct Quarter
rules: At the end of your turn, if the Boss is face up and not Immune, add a rage counter. Then, if there are three or more, flip the Boss.;On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Put a Mortal Wound from your graveyard into your hand.;When a Boss is destroyed, remove all rage counters and destroy all Naxxramas tokens.;When Thaddius is destroyed, flip this card.;BACK:;When this card flips to this side, say Fools, you think yourselves triumphant? You have only taken one step closer to the abyss!;At the end of the raid leader's turn, add a rage counter if there are less than three.;Any raider: Remove three rage counters -> Turn all raiding heroes face up.

name: Patchwerk
rules:
Conspicuous, Assault 10
BACK: Conspicuous, Assault 12
At the start of your turn, you may destroy target ally.

name: Grobbulus
rules:
Conspicuous, Assault 7
At the start of your turn, put a poison counter on a random raiding hero. Grobbulus deals 3 nature damage to each hero for each poison counter on it.
When Grobbulus is destroyed, remove all poison counters from play.
BACK: Conspicuous, Assault 10
At the end of your turn, Grobbulus deals 10 nature damage to each hero for each poison counter on it.
When Grobbulus is destroyed, remove all poison counters from play.

name: Gluth
rules:
Conspicuous, Assault 6
At the start of each raider's turn, put a Zombie Chow into play.
On your turn: Destroy a Zombie Chow -> Gluth heals 3 damage from himself.
BACK: Conspicuous, Assault 6
When Gluth flips to this side, put damage on each raiding hero until it has damage equal to its health -6.
When Gluth is destroyed, remove 15 damage from each raiding hero.

name: Thaddius
rules:
While Stalagg or Feugen is in play, Thaddius has Immune and loses and can't have other powers.
Conspicuous, Assault 10
At the start of each raider's turn, Thaddius deals 10 nature damage to his hero if that raider controls an odd number of characters. Otherwise, his hero deals 10 nature damage to Thaddius.
BACK: Conspicuous, Assault 15
At the start of your turn, Thaddius deals 10 nature damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Military Quarter
rules: Weapons have -1 [ATK].;Armor have -1 [DEF].;On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Put a harvest Soul from your graveyard into your hand.;When a Boss is destroyed, destroy all Naxxramas tokens.;When The Four Horsemen is destroyed, flip this card.;BACK:;When this card flips to this side, say I grow tired of these games. Proceed, and I will banish your souls to oblivion!;Weapons have +1 [ATK].;Armor have +1 [DEF].

name: Instructor Razuvious
rules:
Assault 4
When a Death Knight Understudy leaves your control, flip Razuvious face down.
BACK: Assault 10
Razuvious must attack if able and attack only a Death Knight Understudy if able.
flavour: Sweep the leg! Do you have a problem with that?

name: Gothik the Harvester
rules:
Immune
When Gothik enters play, see Gothik rules.
Once per game: At the start of your turn, put two Unrelenting Riders into play.
When the last Spectral ally leaves your control, flip Gothik.
BACK: On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Gothik deals 4 shadow damage to target ally.
When Gothik is destroyed, he deals 4 shadow damage to each raiding hero.

name: The Four Horsemen
rules:
Immune
At the start of your turn, the raid leader flips a Horseman face down.
Each Horseman can't leave play unless all four have fatal damage.
When a Horseman is dealt fatal damage, flip this card face down.
BACK: Immune
At the start of your turn, the raid leader flips a Horseman face down.
Each Horseman can't leave play unless all four have fatal damage.
Each Horsemen has 0 [ATK] and can't gain ATK while it has fatal damage.
When all four Horsemen leave play, destroy this card.

name: Thane Korth'azz
rules:
At the end of your turn, the raid leader chooses a raiding ally. This ally deals 5 fire damage to it.
BACK: At the end of your turn, this ally deals 5 fire damage to each raiding ally.

name: Lady Blaumeux
rules:
Long-Range
At the end of your turn, the raid leader chooses a raiding ability or equipment. Remove it from the game.
BACK: Long-Range
At the end of your turn, Remove all raiding abilities and equipment from the game.

name: Baron Rivendare
rules:
At the end of your turn, the raid leader chooses a raider. That raider discards a random card.
BACK: At the end of your turn, each raider discards a random card.

name: Sir Zeliek
rules:
Long-Range
At the end of your turn, the raid leader chooses a raiding hero. This ally deals 5 unpreventable holy damage to it.
BACK: Long-Range
At the end of your turn, this ally deals 5 unpreventable holy damage to each raiding hero.

name: Plague Quarter
rules: Raiding allies have -1/-1.;On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Put a Decrepit Fever from your graveyard into your hand.;When a Boss is destroyed, destroy all Naxxramas tokens.;When Loatheb is destroyed, flip this card.;BACK:;When this card flips to this side, say You have no idea what horrors lie ahead. You have seen nothing! The frozen heart of Naxxramas awaits you!;Raiding allies have +1/+1.

name: Noth the Plaguebringer
rules:
Assault 3
At the end of your turn, put a Plagued Warrior into play and flip Noth.
BACK: Elusive
Noth can't attack.
At the end of your turn, put a Plagued Champion into play and flip Noth.
flavour: How dare you! Get out of my sight!

name: Heigan the Unclean
rules:
Assault 5
At the start of your turn, roll a die. If you roll odds, Heigan deals that much nature damage to each exhausted raiding hero and ally.
At the end of your turn, flip Heigan.
BACK: Heigan can't attack.
When a hero or ally deals combat damage to Heigan, he deals 3 nature damage to that character.
At the start of your turn, roll a die. If you roll evens, Heigan deals that much nature damage to each ready raiding hero and ally.
At the end of your turn, flip Heigan.

name: Loatheb
rules:
Assault 8
At the end of your turn, Loatheb deals 3 shadow damage to each raiding hero. Flip Loatheb.
BACK: Assault 8
At the end of your turn, Loatheb deals 3 shadow damage to each raiding ally. Destroy Fungal Creep, put Spore into play, and flip Loatheb.

name: Frostwyrm Lair
rules: When raiders enter Frostwyrm Lair, the Boss player shuffles his graveyard into his deck, then draws cards until he have seven.;[Exhaust] -> Draw a card.;When Sapphiron is destroyed, flip this card.;BACK:;When this card flips to this side, put three random Kel'Thuzad allies into play.;At the start of each player's turn, put three random Kel'Thuzad allies into play.;Kel'Thuzad has Immune until nine Kel'Thuzad allies have entered play.;[Exhaust] -> Draw a card.

name: Sapphiron
rules:
When Sapphiron exhausts, he deals 5 melee damage to target raiding hero.
At the end of your turn, Sapphiron deals 5 shadow damage to a random raiding hero and 1 damage from himself for each damage dealt this way. Flip Sapphiron.
BACK: [ATK] cards can't attack or exhaust.
At the start of your turn, Sapphiron deals 5 frost damage to a random raiding hero, and then attach Icebolt to it.
Any raider: Discard a card -> Put a shelter counter on your hero or each ally you control.

name: Kel'Thuzad
rules:
When Kel'Thuzad loses Immune, gain control of up to one target raiding ally. Then, search a raiding deck, graveyard, hand, and removed from game zone for up to one ally each and put them into play.
At the end of your turn, flip Kel'Thuzad.
BACK: At the end of each raider's turn, Kel'Thuzad deals 30 frost damage to his hero.
Any raider: Exhaust a [ATK] card you control -> This turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero this way.
flavour: Minions, servants, soldiers of the cold dark... obey the call of Kel'Thuzad!

name: Condemnation
rules:
Target up to one hero or ally each raider controls.
The Boss deals X unpreventable holy damage to each target, where X is the highest cost among cards in that target's party.
flavour: It is... as it should be. - Sir Zeliek

name: Decrepit Fever
rules:
Attach to target raiding hero.
Ongoing: If a hero or ally in attached hero's party would deal damage, it deals that much -3 instead.
When a hero or ally in attached hero's party deals damage, destroy this ability.

name: Detonate Mana
rules:
Target raider discards three random cards.
The Boss deals 2 shadow damage to that raider's hero for each card discarded this way.
flavour: Your petty magics are no challenge to the might of the Scourge! - Kel'Thuzad

name: Disrupting Shout
rules: Interrupt taget card. If you do, remove it from the game.

name: Frostbolt Volley
rules: The Boss deals 3 frost damage to each raiding hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
flavour: Enough! I grow tired of these distractions! - Kel'Thuzad

name: Harvest Soul
rules:
Attach to target raiding ally.
Ongoing: You control attached ally.
Put 1 damage on attached ally -> The Boss heals 1 damage from itself.

name: Jagged Knife
rules: Target two raiding abilities, two raiding allies, or two raiding equipment. Exaust the first. If you do, it can't ready during its controller's next ready step, and destroy the second.
flavour: You should've stayed home! - Instructor Razuvious

name: Locust Swarm
rules: Each raider turns a ressource he controls face down. Draw a card for each resource turned this way.
flavour: Yes, run! It makes the blood pump faster! - Anub'Rekhan

name: Meteor
rules:
The Boss deals 15 fire damage, divided as the raid leader chooses, to any number of raiding heroes.
When a hero dealt damage this way, its controller destroys an ability, or equiment he controls.
flavour: I like my meat extra crispy! - Thane Korth'azz

name: Mortal Wound
rules:
Attach to target raiding hero, and the Boss deals 3 melee damage to it.
Ongoing: At the end of your turn, add a fester counter.
If attached hero would be healed, it is healed that much -1 for each fester counter insted.
When all damage is healed from attached hero, destroy this ability.

name: Shadow Fissure
rules: Target up to one raiding ability, up to one raiding ally, and up to one raiding equipment. Romove them from the game.
flavour: The dark void awaits you! - Kel'Thuzad

name: Unyielding Pain
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> This turn, target hero or ally you control has Assault 2, and combat damage that it would deal is unpreventable.
flavour: I do hope they stay alive long enough for me to... introduce myself. - Lady Blaumeux

name: Web Wrap
rules:
Attach to target raiding hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, the Boss deals 3 nature damage to attached character.
Attached character can't attack or exhaust, and loses and can't have powers.
This ability can be attacked or targeted like an ally.

name: Fungal Creep
rules:
Ongoing: If a hero or ally in attached hero's party would deal or heal damage, it deals or heals that much +2 instead.
When Loatheb is destroyed, destroy Fungal Creep.

name: Icebolt
rules:
Ongoing: When Icebolt attaches to a hero, put a shelter counter on that hero and each ally in its party.
Attached hero can't attack, exhaust, or be dealt damage.
At the end of your turn, destroy icebolt and then Sapphiron deals 150.000 unpreventable frost damage to each raiding hero and ally without a shelter counter. Remove all shelter counter from play and flip Shapphiron.

name: Frost Blast
rules:
Ongoing: Attached hero cnat' attack, exhaust, or be dealt damage.
At the start of your turn, destroy Frost Blast, and then Kel'Thuzad deals 10 frost damage to attached hero.

name: Assembled Masses
rules:
Target hero or ally you control has Assault 3 this turn.
If you're in the Construct quarter, it has an additional Assault 3 and can't be protected against.

name: Broodmother's Rage
rules:
Target a raider. Heroes and allies he controls lose and can't have powers this turn.
If you're in the Arachnid Quarter, all raiding heroes and allies lose and can't have powers this turn.

name: Cat's Meow
rules:
If Mr. Bigglesworth is in play, he heals 5 damage from each raiding hero, and each raider draws a card.
Otherwise, the Boss deals 5 meowlee damage to each raiding hero, and each raider discards a card.

name: Chill of Undeath
rules:
Turn all heroes face down.
If you're in Forswyrm Lair, the Boss deals 5 frost damage to each raiding hero.

name: Debacle
rules: The raid leader turns three raiding resources face down.

name: Debilitating Nausea
rules:
Target raider can't play cards this turn.
If you're in the Plague Quarter, he also can't play cards on his next turn.

name: Fortuitous Gift
rules: The raid leader chooses one: He draws three cards, or each raider draws a card.

name: Frigid Hopelessness
rules: The raid leader chooses one: The Boss deals 9 frost damage to the raid leader's hero; or it deals 3 frost damage to each raiding hero.

name: Grave Bargain
rules: You pay 1 less to play cards this turn.

name: Hastened Preparation
rules: The raid leaders chooses one: He readies all of his resources; or each raider readies two of his resources.

name: Ice-Cold Refreshment
rules: Draw three cards.

name: Inevitable Failure
rules:
Look at target raider's hand and choose a card.
He discards that card.

name: Premature Departure
rules: The raid leader destroys a raiding ability, ally, and equipment.

name: Punish the Greedy
rules:
The raider with the most cards in hand discards one.
The raider with the most face-up resources turns one face down. The Boss deals 5 frost damage to the raiding hero with the least damage.
The Boss player decides any ties.

name: Ruthless Precision
rules:
Destroy target raiding equipment.
If you're in the Military Quarter, the Boss deals melee damage to that equipment's controller's hero equal to its cost.

name: Shadow of Obliteration
rules: Remove all cards in raiding graveyards from the game.

name: Shadowy Intrusion
rules: The raid leader chooses one: He discards three cards; or each raider discards a card.

name: Tempt Your Fate
rules: Each player rolls a die. Each raider who rolls higher than the Boss player takes an extra turn after that raider's next turn. Each raider who rolls lower than the Boss player skips his next turn.

name: Timely Respite
rules: The raid leader chooses one: His hero heals 6 damage from itself; or each raiding hero heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Unholy Mending
rules: When you play an ability this turn, the Boss heals 2 damage from target hero or ally you control.

name: Kel'Thuzad's Blast
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, Kel'Thuzad deals 5 frost damage to a random raiding hero and then attach Frost Blast to it.

name: Kel'Thuzad's Detonation
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, each raider destroys three resources he controls.

name: Kel'Thuzad's Fissure
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, target up to one raiding ability, up to one raiding ally, and up to one raiding equipment. Remove them from the game.

name: Kel'Thuzad's Guardians
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, put a Guardian of Icecrown into play.

name: Kel'Thuzad's Volley
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, Kel'Thuzad deals 3 frost damage to each raiding hero and ally.

name: Mr. Bigglesworth
rules:
This ally can't attack.
When this ally is destroyed, say No!!! A curse upon you, interlopers! The armies of the Lich King will hunt you down. You will not escape your fate...

name: Crypt Guard
rules: When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a Web Wrap and put it into play attached to target raiding hero or ally.

name: Naxxramas Worshipper
rules: Any raider: Exhaust a Priest you control -> Gain control of this ally.;Any raider who controls this ally: Destroy this ally -> Flip Faerlina face up.

name: Zombie Chow
rules: Any raider: Exhaust a Death Knight, Hunter, Paladin, Shaman, or Warrior you control -> Exhaust this ally.

name: Stalagg
rules:
Conspicuous, Assault 5
When this ally enters play, raiding heroes and allies have -5 ATK this turn.
At the start of the Boss player's turn, if Feugen is not in play, he puts him into play.

name: Feugen
rules:
Conspicuous, Assault 5
When this ally enters play, he deals 2 shadow damage to each raiding hero and ally.
At the start of the Boss player's turn, if Stalagg is not in play, he puts him into play.

name: Death Knight Understudy
rules: Any raider: Exhaust a non-token ally you control Gain control of this ally.

name: Unrelenting Death Knight
rules: When this ally leaves play, the Boss player puts a Spectral Death Knight into play.

name: Unrelenting Rider
rules:
Ferocity
When this ally leaves play, the Boss player puts a Spectral Rider into play.

name: Spectral Death Knight
rules: When this ally deals combat damage to a hero or ally, he also deals 1 melee damage to each other hero and ally in that character's party.

name: Spectral Rider
rules:
Ferocity
When this ally is dealt damage, he deals 1 shadow damage to its source.

name: Plagued Champion
rules: Protector

name: Plagued Warrior
rules: When this ally deals combat damage to a hero, he also deals that much melee damage to each other raiding hero.

name: Spore
rules:
This ally can't attack.
Raiding heroes and allies can't be healed.
When this ally is dealt fatal damage by a hero or ally.
Attach Fungal Creep to that character's controller's hero.

name: Soul Weaver
rules: Melee Resistance;When this ally enters play, put target non-hero raiding card into its owner's hand.

name: Unstoppable Abomination
rules:
This ally can't be protected against.
Damage that this ally would deal is unpreventable.

name: Soldier of the Grozen Wastes
rules: When this ally enters play, draw a card.

name: Guardian of Icecrown
rules:
Protector
This ally has +1 / +1 for each face-up Event in play.
flavour: I command you to fight, kill, and die for you master. Let none survive... - The Lich King
